I absolutely cannot recommend this place an enough! We will definitely return here next time we’re in town for a concert!

This was my first AirBnb ever. I only had 2 issues (both dealing with the keyless lock, my first time using one) and the hosts responded immediately.
The place was immaculate, true to online photos and location is perfect. Everything is a 10 minute drive. Franklin Park is within walking distance.
I grew up in Bloomington, moved away 25 years ago, to Florida. I remember this house and always loved it. I came back to sprinkle my brothers ashes near our moms grave. He was killed in a bicycle/vehicle accident in Florida.
I needed peace, this place was perfect.
I had a couple friends pick me up and they wanted a tour. They loved it as well.
Bloomington is a hidden gem. People are kind and genuine. Lots of great spots to eat.
And now, this awesome airBnb. I will definitely rebook as I do come back quite often.
Thank you to my hosts.
Your little gem of a unit is absolutely quaint, cutely styled and peaceful.
